Package com.bazaarvoice.bvandroidsdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Ads
    Interface defining Ads module API
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdTracker
    Tracker for each of the five kinds of ads
    BVAdListener
    This class is for setting up ad listeners for each kind of Ad
    BVAds
    Bazaarvoice Ads SDK class for fetching Bazaarvoice tailored ad content
    BVContentAdLoadedListener
    Adloader listener for Native Content Ads
    ContextualInterests
    Interests that can be used to customize recommendations
